get.summary: List all operations provided by Microsoft.Elastic.
List all monitors under the specified subscription.
Get a list of available versions for a region.

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Region where elastic deployment will take place.

get.summary: List all monitors under the specified resource group.
Get the properties of a specific monitor resource.

post.summary: List the resources currently being monitored by the Elastic monitor resource.
Fetch information regarding Elastic cloud deployment corresponding to the Elastic monitor resource.
Create User inside elastic deployment which are used by customers to perform operations on the elastic deployment

get.summary: List the tag rules for a given monitor resource.

put.summary: Create or update a tag rule set for a given monitor resource.

get.summary: Get a tag rule set for a given monitor resource.

delete.summary: Delete a tag rule set for a given monitor resource.

post.summary: List the vm resources currently being monitored by the Elastic monitor resource.
List the vm ingestion details that will be monitored by the Elastic monitor resource.
Update the vm details that will be monitored by the Elastic monitor resource.
List of upgradable versions for a given monitor resource.
Upgradable version for a monitor resource.
Get the list of all traffic filters for the account.
Get the list of all associated traffic filters for the given deployment.
Create and Associate IP traffic filter for the given deployment.
Create and Associate private link traffic filter for the given deployment.
Associate traffic filter for the given deployment.
Detach and Delete traffic filter from the given deployment.
Detach traffic filter for the given deployment.
Delete traffic filter from the account.
Fetch User API Key from internal database, if it was generated and stored while creating the Elasticsearch Organization.
post.description: Fetch User API Key from internal database, if it was generated and stored while creating the Elasticsearch Organization.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Email Id parameter of the User Organization, of which the API Key must be returned

OperationDisplay.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Type on which the operation is performed, e.g., 'monitors'.

operation.description: Operation type, e.g., read, write, delete, etc.

description.description: Description of the operation, e.g., 'Write monitors'.

isDataAction.description: Indicates whether the operation is a data action

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

OperationListResult.description: Result of GET request to list the Microsoft.Elastic operations.

value.description: List of operations supported by the Microsoft.Elastic provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

MonitoringStatus.description: Flag specifying if the resource monitoring is enabled or disabled.

ElasticCloudUser.description: Details of the user's elastic account.

emailAddress.description: Email of the Elastic User Account.

id.description: User Id of the elastic account of the User.

elasticCloudSsoDefaultUrl.description: Elastic cloud default dashboard sso URL of the Elastic user account.

ElasticCloudDeployment.description: Details of the user's elastic deployment associated with the monitor resource.

azureSubscriptionId.description: Associated Azure subscription Id for the elastic deployment.

elasticsearchRegion.description: Region where Deployment at Elastic side took place.

elasticsearchServiceUrl.description: Elasticsearch ingestion endpoint of the Elastic deployment.

kibanaServiceUrl.description: Kibana endpoint of the Elastic deployment.

kibanaSsoUrl.description: Kibana dashboard sso URL of the Elastic deployment.

elasticCloudUser.description: Details of the user's elastic account.

elasticCloudDeployment.description: Details of the elastic cloud deployment.

CompanyInfo.description: Company information of the user to be passed to partners.

employeesNumber.description: Number of employees in the company

UserInfo.description: User Information to be passed to partners.

emailAddress.description: Email of the user used by Elastic for contacting them if needed

companyInfo.description: Company information of the user to be passed to partners.

MonitorProperties.description: Properties specific to the monitor resource.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the monitor resource.

monitoringStatus.description: Flag specifying if the resource monitoring is enabled or disabled.

version.description: Version of elastic of the monitor resource

generateApiKey.description: Flag to determine if User API Key has to be generated and shared.

id.description: ARM id of the monitor resource.

type.description: The type of the monitor resource.

identity.description: Identity properties of the monitor resource.

tags.description: The tags of the monitor resource.

location.description: The location of the monitor resource

systemData.description: The system metadata relating to this resource

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results, if any.

SendingLogs.description: Flag indicating the status of the resource for sending logs operation to Elastic.
SendingLogs.title: SendingLogs

MonitoredResource.description: The properties of a resource currently being monitored by the Elastic monitor resource.

id.description: The ARM id of the resource.

sendingLogs.description: Flag indicating the status of the resource for sending logs operation to Elastic.

reasonForLogsStatus.description: Reason for why the resource is sending logs (or why it is not sending).

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results, if any.

TagAction.description: Valid actions for a filtering tag. Exclusion takes priority over inclusion.

FilteringTag.description: The definition of a filtering tag. Filtering tags are used for capturing resources and include/exclude them from being monitored.

name.description: The name (also known as the key) of the tag.

action.description: Valid actions for a filtering tag.

ElasticVersionsListResponse.description: List of elastic versions available in a region.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results, if any.

LogRules.description: Set of rules for sending logs for the Monitor resource.

sendAadLogs.description: Flag specifying if AAD logs should be sent for the Monitor resource.

sendSubscriptionLogs.description: Flag specifying if subscription logs should be sent for the Monitor resource.

sendActivityLogs.description: Flag specifying if activity logs from Azure resources should be sent for the Monitor resource.

filteringTags.description: List of filtering tags to be used for capturing logs. This only takes effect if SendActivityLogs flag is enabled. If empty, all resources will be captured. If only Exclude action is specified, the rules will apply to the list of all available resources. If Include actions are specified, the rules will only include resources with the associated tags.

MonitoringTagRulesProperties.description: Definition of the properties for a TagRules resource.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the monitoring tag rules.

MonitoringTagRules.description: Capture logs and metrics of Azure resources based on ARM tags.

id.description: The id of the rule set.

type.description: The type of the rule set.

properties.description: Properties of the monitoring tag rules.

systemData.description: The system metadata relating to this resource

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results, if any.

MarketplaceSaaSInfo.description: Marketplace SAAS Info of the resource.

id.description: Marketplace Subscription Id. This is a GUID-formatted string.

ElasticDeploymentStatus.description: Flag specifying if the Elastic deployment status is healthy or not.

DeploymentInfoResponse.description: The properties of deployment in Elastic cloud corresponding to the Elastic monitor resource.

version.description: Version of the elasticsearch in Elastic cloud deployment.

memoryCapacity.description: RAM capacity of the elasticsearch in Elastic cloud deployment.

diskCapacity.description: Disk capacity of the elasticsearch in Elastic cloud deployment.

deploymentUrl.description: Deployment URL of the elasticsearch in Elastic cloud deployment.

marketplaceSaasInfo.description: Marketplace SaaS Info of the resource.

ExternalUserCreationResponse.description: The properties of the response we got from elastic while creating external user

created.description: Shows if user is created or updated

ExternalUserInfo.description: The properties of the request required for creating user on elastic side

userName.description: Username of the user to be created or updated

fullName.description: Full name of the user to be created or updated

password.description: Password of the user to be created or updated

emailId.description: Email id of the user to be created or updated

roles.description: Roles to be assigned for  created or updated user

nextLink.description: Link to the next Vm resource Id, if any.

VMResources.description: The vm resource properties that is currently being monitored by the Elastic monitor resource.

vmResourceId.description: The ARM id of the VM resource.

VMIngestionDetailsResponse.description: The vm ingestion details to install an agent.

cloudId.description: The cloudId of given Elastic monitor resource.

ingestionKey.description: Ingestion details to install agent on given VM.

OperationName.description: Operation to be performed on the given vm resource id.
OperationName.title: OperationName

vmResourceId.description: ARM id of the VM resource.

operationName.description: Operation to be performed for given VM.

UpgradableVersionsList.description: Stack Versions that this version can upgrade to

currentVersion.description: Current version of the elastic monitor

upgradableVersions.description: Stack Versions that this version can upgrade to

ElasticTrafficFilterResponse.description: List of elastic traffic filters in the account

rulesets.description: List of elastic traffic filters in the account

source.description: IP of the elastic filter rule

description.description: Description of the elastic filter rule

azureEndpointGuid.description: Guid of Private Endpoint in the elastic filter rule

azureEndpointName.description: Name of the Private Endpoint in the elastic filter rule

id.description: Id of the elastic filter rule

version.description: Version to which the elastic monitor should be upgraded to

UserEmailId.description: Email Id of the User Organization, of which the API Key must be returned

UserApiKeyResponse.description: The User Api Key created for the Organization associated with the User Email Id that was passed in the request

apiKey.description: The User Api Key Generated based on ReturnApiKey flag. This is applicable for non-Portal clients only.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to be used with the HTTP request.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000)

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
